Title: Scatter the old world, build a new world
Designer: Central Art Academy Blockprint combat group (中央美术学院版画战斗组)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: A Red Guard at work, smashing books, religious sculptures and other items considered as the 'Four Olds' (四旧). In the background groups of Red Guards storm buildings and take down signboards. During the most violent phase of the Cultural Revolution, property of 'rightists' and anything considered old, bourgeois, decadent or connected with religion is literally smashed to pieces wholesale.
